title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: November 05, 2022, 02:14:04 AMLast edit: November 21, 2022, 05:01:55 PM by MoparMiningLLC
content: Balletcrypto has released their annual holiday cards and this year there are 2 designs and the cards are sold in 2 configurations - as a 2 pack (one of each) or as a 5 pack (5 of one design)2 pack - mixed combo:5 pack - Happy Holidays:5 pack - Merry Christmas:The wallets are the steel REAL Series WalletsCosts are as follows:2 Pack: $695 Pack: $129Payments can be sent in the following methods:Bitcoin: 1FGTHoXtr6X9PVm5qJpa9DbdZFpAGLAa8GLN Invoice: send me a PM and I will generate onePayPal: MoparMiningLLC@gmail.comPlease list your name and detail what you would like - example:MoparMiningLLC - two 2 packs, one 5 pack Happy Holidays and two 5 packs Merry Christmas
